name: Conqueror's Blade - 1-day Premium Account Gift
detailed_description: Every legend begins somewhere, so enjoy a free gift as you start your own. With a Premium Account, you can earn experience even faster and unlock other unique privileges!
about_the_game: Every legend begins somewhere, so enjoy a free gift as you start your own. With a Premium Account, you can earn experience even faster and unlock other unique privileges!
short_description: Every legend begins somewhere, so enjoy a free gift as you start your own. With a Premium Account, you can earn experience even faster and unlock other unique privileges!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4-Core Processor +
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R9 270 +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel I7 4-Core Processor 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
